column4: Anyone know why my X server won't start after i installed the nvidia drivers? It says it can't detect my display.
Did it say 'No Screens found'?
Possible, but i think is was something about displays.
I'd have to see all the real errors
are you dual-booting or something?
That could be tricky, im in the command line. Yes, im dual-booting.
Alright, I need you to reboot to ubuntu and after X fails to start and you're at the command line run 'cat /var/log/Xorg.0.log | grep EE'
And look for any obvious 'oops' errors
Damn, i missed it and i'm short of a scroll atm :P
Rebooting now, i'll be right back.
alright
The error was "No Decices Detected"
nothing else?
Nope. That was the only EE
ouchie
If you switch back to the 'nv' or 'vesa' drivers does it work?
Nope.
sudo dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xorg
actually, wait
sudo dpkg-reconfigure -phigh xserver-xorg
see if it works with a stock xorg.conf
Thanks, i'll be right back.
Yes, it did work. Thanks, but how do i get the nvidia driver to work?
Thanks, it's working super now :)
